response_headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' https://interfaces.zapier.com https://tibot-histologe.zapier.app; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://cdn.matomo.cloud https://unpkg.com https://interfaces.zapier.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://unpkg.com; img-src 'self' data: blob: https://voxusagers.numerique.gouv.fr https://*.tile.openstreetmap.org https://unpkg.com https://jedonnemonavis.numerique.gouv.fr; connect-src 'self' https://api-adresse.data.gouv.fr https://cdn.matomo.cloud https://koumoul.com https://sentry.incubateur.net; font-src 'self'; frame-src 'none'; object-src 'none';

content-security-policy.name: content-security-policy
content-security-policy.score_description: Content Security Policy (CSP) implemented unsafely. This includes 'unsafe-inline' or data: inside script-src, overly broad sources such as https: inside object-src or script-src, or not restricting the sources for object-src or script-src.

contribute.name: contribute
contribute.score_description: Contribute.json isn't required on websites that don't belong to Mozilla

cookies.name: cookies
cookies.score_description: All cookies use the Secure flag, session cookies use the HttpOnly flag, and cross-origin restrictions are in place via the SameSite flag

cross-origin-resource-sharing.name: cross-origin-resource-sharing
cross-origin-resource-sharing.score_description: Content is not visible via cross-origin resource sharing (CORS) files or headers

redirection.name: redirection
redirection.score_description: Initial redirection is to HTTPS on same host, final destination is HTTPS

strict-transport-security.name: strict-transport-security
strict-transport-security.score_description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) header set to a minimum of six months (15768000)

subresource-integrity.name: subresource-integrity
subresource-integrity.score_description: Subresource Integrity (SRI) not implemented, but all scripts are loaded from a similar origin

x-frame-options.name: x-frame-options
x-frame-options.score_description: X-Frame-Options (XFO) header set to SAMEORIGIN or DENY

x-xss-protection.name: x-xss-protection
x-xss-protection.score_description: Deprecated X-XSS-Protection header set to "1; mode=block"

rule.description: Reflection should not be vulnerable to injection attacks
rule.name: phpsecurity:S6173

message.text:
Change this code to not construct class or method names directly from user-controlled data.

See more on SonarCloud

testssl.finding: 'renegotiation info/#65281' 'server name/#0' 'EC point formats/#11' 'session ticket/#35' 'supported versions/#43' 'key share/#51' 'supported_groups/#10' 'max fragment length/#1' 'application layer protocol negotiation/#16' 'extended master secret/#23'
TLS Web Server Authentication, TLS Web Client Authentication
Ok via SAN and CN (SNI mandatory)
certificate has no extended life time according to browser forum
domain is NOT marked for preloading
No support for HTTP Public Key Pinning
No Server banner line in header, interesting!

not vulnerable, no RSA key transport cipher
potentially VULNERABLE, gzip HTTP compression detected  - only supplied '/' tested
not vulnerable on this host and port

not vulnerable, no DH EXPORT ciphers,
not vulnerable, no SSL3 or TLS1

technologies.name: Sentry
technologies.description: Sentry is an open-source platform for workflow productivity, aggregating errors from across the stack in real time.

technologies.name: PHP
technologies.description: PHP is a general-purpose scripting language used for web development.

technologies.name: TinyMCE
technologies.description: TinyMCE is an online rich-text editor released as open-source software. TinyMCE is designed to integrate with JavaScript libraries, Vue.js, and AngularJS as well as content management systems such as Joomla!, and WordPress.

technologies.name: Vue.js
technologies.description: Vue.js is an open-source model–view–viewmodel JavaScript framework for building user interfaces and single-page applications.

technologies.name: Matomo Analytics
technologies.description: Matomo Analytics is a free and open-source web analytics application, that runs on a PHP/MySQL web-server.

technologies.name: core-js
technologies.description: core-js is a modular standard library for JavaScript, with polyfills for cutting-edge ECMAScript features.

technologies.name: Sendinblue
technologies.description: Sendinblue is an email marketing solution for small and medium-sized businesses that want to send and automate email marketing campaigns.

technologies.name: HSTS
technologies.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.

technologies.name: Webpack
technologies.description: Webpack is an open-source JavaScript module bundler.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

info.name: SPF Record - Detection
author: rxerium
info.description: An SPF TXT record was detected

info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

info.name: DNS DMARC - Detect
author: juliosmelo
info.description: DNS DMARC information was detected.

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

info.name: Cookies without HttpOnly or Secure attribute - Detect
author: princechaddha
mr.bobo hp
info.description: Checks whether cookies in the HTTP response contain the HttpOnly attribute. If the HttpOnly flag is set, it means that the cookie is HTTP-only
info.impact: Lack of HttpOnly flag on cookies increases the risk of client-side attacks, compromising user session security and data privacy.
info.remediation: Ensure that all cookies are set with the HttpOnly attribute to prevent client-side access.

nuclei.curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: histologe.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://histologe.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: These checks highlight opportunities to [improve the accessibility of your web app](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/accessibility). Only a subset of accessibility issues can be automatically detected so manual testing is also encouraged.
accessibility.manualDescription: These items address areas which an automated testing tool cannot cover. Learn more in our guide on [conducting an accessibility review](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/accessibility/how-to-review).

seo.title: SEO
seo.description: These checks ensure that your page is following basic search engine optimization advice. There are many additional factors Lighthouse does not score here that may affect your search ranking, including performance on [Core Web Vitals](https://web.dev/learn-web-vitals/). [Learn more](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/35769).
seo.manualDescription: Run these additional validators on your site to check additional SEO best practices.

pwa.title: PWA
pwa.description: These checks validate the aspects of a Progressive Web App. [Learn more](https://developers.google.com/web/progressive-web-apps/checklist).
pwa.manualDescription: These checks are required by the baseline [PWA Checklist](https://developers.google.com/web/progressive-web-apps/checklist) but are not automatically checked by Lighthouse. They do not affect your score but it's important that you verify them manually.

attributes.name: Histologe
attributes.pitch: Faciliter la détection des situations de mal logement, pour une prise en charge et une résolution accélérées.
